__e: I don't know what was real and what wasn't.
I'm not saying that it was me, and I'm not saying that it wasn't me.
I know I told you he wasn't, but he's my friend.
And even if it were, he must go.
Except that we're no closer to finding him now than we were three years ago.
She's better off than she was an hour ago.
But,please,don't let Amy feel like she's any less of a person than she was before this happened, Because she's not, and neither are you.
His father was before him, and his son will be too.
And I thought it was important to you.
I'm sure, he wasn't too good in real life either, but now...
And I feel that if he was happy and if my mom was happy, then maybe I could be happy.
Not that it wasn't great, 'cause it was, but I'm not really looking to start anything.
I mean,at first it was,but now I think it's more me.
She's not really a man... but she was.
Still, I don't think anyone told him that it matters to me.
He was perfect to me, and... I don't want to have to wonder if this is all his fault.
I just want to be there for him, you know, like he always is for me.
